offset.description: An array of two numbers to offset the component horizontally and vertically in pixels
offset.description_zh: 一个包含两个数字的数组，用于水平和垂直偏移组件（以像素为单位）

expand.description: By default the component shrinks to content's size; By using this prop you make the component fully expand horizontally or vertically, based on 'position' prop
expand.description_zh: 默认情况下，组件会缩小到内容的大小;通过使用这个 prop，你可以根据 'position' 属性使组件在水平或垂直方向上完全展开
